## Cisco-IOS-XE-template.yang


- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)
- [XPaths Deprecated](#xpaths-deprecated)
- [XPaths Modified](#xpaths-modified)

## XPaths Obsoleted

N/A

## XPaths Deprecated

### Description

Hardening - Service-template/access-group need to list and template/service-policy must be defined

### Reason

access-group in service-template needs to be list.

- /native/ios-sw:service-template/ios-sw:access-group

## XPaths Modified

N/A

## XPaths Added

### Description

Hardening - Service-template/access-group need to list and template/service-policy must be defined

### Reason

New node created as part of the deprecation

- /native/ios-sw:service-template/ios-sw:access-group-config
